title: How to Unblock a Number on Android

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It’s the icon of a phone receiver on the home screen. If you don’t see it there, check the app drawer. This method should work on any Google, Motorola, OnePlus, or Lenovo phone.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . You'll see this three-dot menu icon in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's usually the second option in the menu.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Blocked numbers.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Blocked numbers . A list of blocked phone numbers will appear. If you don’t see this option, return to the Phone app and tap ⁝ (at the top-right corner), select Settings , then Call blocking . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the x icon next to the number you wish to unblock.
steps.content: Tap the x icon next to the number you wish to unblock. A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap Unblock . Calls from this phone number will once again come through to your phone.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It’s the phone receiver icon typically found near the bottom of the home screen.

steps.title: Tap ⁝.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ . It’s at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings .

steps.title: Tap Block numbers.
steps.content: Tap Block numbers .

steps.title: Tap the - (minus) icon next to the number you wish to unblock.
steps.content: Tap the - (minus) icon next to the number you wish to unblock. This removes the phone number from the blocked list. Also make sure the toggle next to Block unknown/private numbers is off if you want to receive those calls.

steps.title: Open your HTC’s phone dialer.
steps.content: Open your HTC’s phone dialer. It’s the phone receiver icon typically found on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap ⁝.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. Phones like Alcatel are very similar and will have the same steps to unblock numbers. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Blocked contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked contacts . A list of blocked numbers will appear.

steps.title: Tap and hold the number you wish to unblock.
steps.content: Tap and hold the number you wish to unblock. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Tap Unblock contacts.
steps.content: Tap Unblock contacts . A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap OK.
steps.content: Tap OK . The selected contact is now unblocked.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. It’s the phone receiver icon typically found on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap ⋯.
steps.content: Tap ⋯ . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Block List.
steps.content: Tap Block List . A list of blocked contacts and phone numbers will appear.

steps.title: Tap Remove from block list.
steps.content: Tap Remove from block list . A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap OK.
steps.content: Tap OK . This contact or phone number is no longer blocked.
